mapper.update: INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_STATS( SEQ, CONNECT_DATE, CONNECT_TIME, CONNECT_CNT ) VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(hs2.SEQ),0)+1 FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_STATS as hs2), #{todayDate}, #{todayTime}, 1 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CONNECT_CNT = CONNECT_CNT + 1

INSERT INTO DB_HOMEPAGE.MO_STATS( SEQ, CONNECT_DATE, CONNECT_TIME, CONNECT_PAGE, CONNECT_CNT ) VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ms2.SEQ),0)+1 FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.MO_STATS as ms2), #{todayDate}, #{todayTime}, #{todayPage}, 1 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CONNECT_CNT = CONNECT_CNT + 1
mapper.select: SELECT ha.ALARM_LINK_URL, ha.ALARM_TARGET, ha.ALARM_REAL_PATH FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_ALARM AS ha WHERE ha.ALARM_TYPE = #{alarm_type} AND ha.ALARM_USE = #{alarm_use} AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN ALARM_START_DATE AND ALARM_END_DATE ORDER BY ha.ALARM_ID ASC
SELECT ha.ALARM_ID, ha.ALARM_POSITION FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_ALARM AS ha WHERE ha.ALARM_TYPE = #{alarm_type} AND ha.ALARM_USE = #{alarm_use} ORDER BY ha.ALARM_SORT DESC

SELECT ha.ALARM_ID, ha.ALARM_TITLE, ha.ALARM_CONTENT FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_ALARM AS ha WHERE ha.ALARM_TYPE = #{alarm_type}
AND ha.ALARM_ID = #{alarm_id} ORDER BY ha.ALARM_SORT DESC
SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_CODEBOOK WHERE CODE_TYPE = 'CALL_CENTER' AND USE_YN = '1' ORDER BY CODE_NAME

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_BOARD as hbd WHERE hbd.CONF_ID IN
#{obj.value}
AND hbd.IS_TOP = 0
AND hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
AND hbd.BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
AND ( hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR hbd.BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' )

( SELECT hbd.BOARD_NUM, hbd.BOARD_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(hbd.BOARD_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as BOARD_REG_DATE, hbd.BOARD_VIEW, CASE WHEN hbd.IS_TOP = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_TOP, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_FILES AS hfl WHERE hfl.BOARD_NUM = hbd.BOARD_NUM AND hfl.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME not like '%:\%') = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FILE_YN FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_BOARD as hbd WHERE hbd.CONF_ID IN
#{obj.value}
AND hbd.IS_TOP = 1 ORDER BY hbd.BOARD_REG_DATE DESC, hbd.BOARD_NUM DESC ) UNION ( SELECT A.BOARD_NUM, A.BOARD_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(A.BOARD_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as BOARD_REG_DATE, A.BOARD_VIEW, A.IS_TOP, A.FILE_YN FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY hbd.BOARD_REG_DATE DESC, hbd.BOARD_NUM DESC) AS ROWNUM, hbd.BOARD_NUM, hbd.BOARD_TITLE, hbd.BOARD_REG_DATE, hbd.BOARD_VIEW, CASE WHEN hbd.IS_TOP = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_TOP, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_FILES AS hfl WHERE hfl.BOARD_NUM = hbd.BOARD_NUM AND hfl.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME not like '%:\%') = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FILE_YN FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_BOARD as hbd WHERE hbd.CONF_ID IN
#{obj.value}
AND hbd.IS_TOP = 0
AND hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
AND hbd.BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
AND ( hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR hbd.BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' )
ORDER BY hbd.BOARD_REG_DATE DESC, hbd.BOARD_NUM DESC ) AS A WHERE A.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start_index} + 1 AND #{start_index} + #{page_size} ORDER BY A.ROWNUM ASC ) ORDER BY IS_TOP DESC, BOARD_REG_DATE DESC, BOARD_NUM DESC
SELECT hfl.SEQ, hfl.BOARD_NUM, hfl.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_FILES as hfl WHERE hfl.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num} AND hfl.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME not like '%:\%' ORDER BY hfl.REG_DATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_BOARD as hbd WHERE hbd.CONF_ID IN
#{obj.value}
AND hbd.IS_TOP = 0
AND hbd.BOARD_REG_DATE >= (SELECT hbd2.BOARD_REG_DATE FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.HP_BOARD AS hbd2 WHERE hbd2.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}) AND hbd.BOARD_NUM != #{board_num}
AND hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
AND hbd.BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
AND ( hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR hbd.BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' )
LIMIT 1

AND hbd.IS_TOP = 0

AND hbd.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%'
